bụ ụlọ ọrụ nwere isi na Casablanca

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmanụ na gas (Afriquia, Afriquia Gaz, Tissir Gaz, Maghreb Oxygen), retail (Mini-Brahim), njem nlegharị anya (Société d'Aménagement et de Promotion de la Station Taghazout, Hôtel Fairmont Taghazout Bay), mgbasa ozi
Ndụ akụ na ụba, Taa Morocco, Women of Morocco, Nissae Min Al Maghrib) na ezigbo ala na ụlọ (Ebe obibi Des Zaers).
Akwa Group bụ nke ezinụlọ Akhanouch na Wakrim.
E webatara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1959 dị ka Afriquia SMDC (Société Marocaine de Distribution de Carburants) nke bụ ugbu a enyemaka nke Akwa Group S.A
Isi enyemaka ndị ọzọ, Maghreb Oxygène, malitere na 1974
A haziri nhazi ụlọ ọrụ na 1990 site na okike nke okike
Ndị enyemaka ya bụ Afriquia Gaz na Maghreb Oxygène bụ ndị e depụtara n'ihu ọha na 1999
Groupe Afriquia gbanwere aha ya gaa Akwa Group na March 2002.
E lekwasịrị anya n'ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ụgbọala Afriquia na 2018 Boycott na Morocco.
